Description.Title: SoilTemperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: Simulates soil temperature over a 1-D profile including the surface and several phantom nodes below the profile. The approach follows Campbell (1985): layers are mapped to temperature nodes, volumetric heat capacity and thermal conductivity are derived from soil constituents and water content, and heat flow is solved each sub-daily timestep with an implicit tri-diagonal (Thomas) algorithm using a nu weighting (Crankâ€“Nicholson-like) scheme. The surface energy balance includes net shortwave/longwave radiation, sensible and latent heat, with optional calculation of atmospheric boundary-layer conductance using wind, canopy height, and stability corrections. Air temperature and net radiation are interpolated intra-day from daily weather. The component integrates with APSIM weather, soil physical, organic matter, and soil water modules.
Description.ShortDescription: 1-D soil temperature model with atmospheric coupling and sub-daily heat flow based on Campbell (1985).

Input.name: physical_Thickness
Input.description: Soil layer thicknesses

Input.name: physical_BD
Input.description: Soil bulk density by layer

Input.name: physical_Rocks
Input.description: Rock fragment percentage by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
Input.description: Sand fraction percentage by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
Input.description: Silt fraction percentage by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
Input.description: Clay fraction percentage by layer

Input.name: organic_Carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon percentage by layer

Input.name: waterBalance_SW
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

Input.name: waterBalance_Es
Input.description: Soil evaporation rate

Input.name: waterBalance_Eos
Input.description: Potential soil evaporation (bare soil)

Input.name: waterBalance_Eo
Input.description: Potential evapotranspiration

Input.name: waterBalance_Salb
Input.description: Bare-soil albedo

Input.name: weather_Tav
Input.description: Average annual soil surface temperature baseline

Input.name: weather_Amp
Input.description: Annual temperature amplitude at soil surface

Input.name: weather_Latitude
Input.description: Site latitude

Input.name: weather_MeanT
Input.description: Daily mean air temperature

Input.name: weather_MaxT
Input.description: Daily maximum air temperature

Input.name: weather_MinT
Input.description: Daily minimum air temperature

Input.name: weather_Radn
Input.description: Daily incoming shortwave radiation

Input.name: weather_AirPressure
Input.description: Air pressure

Input.name: weather_Wind
Input.description: Wind speed at instrument height

Input.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
Input.description: Day of year

Input.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Instrument height above ground (optional override)

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth to lower boundary with constant temperature

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Optional initial soil temperature profile for layers (topsoil node onwards)

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Default hour of day of maximum air temperature

Input.name: timestep_seconds
Input.description: External model time step

Input.name: doInitialisationStuff
Input.description: Flag to run one-time initialization in first process call

Input.name: internalTimeStep
Input.description: Internal integration time step (seconds)

Input.name: timeOfDaySecs
Input.description: Current internal time-of-day seconds within daily loop

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Total number of temperature nodes (layers plus phantom nodes)

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Number of soil layers in profile

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Depth of each node center from surface

Input.name: thermCondPar1
Input.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 1 per element

Input.name: thermCondPar2
Input.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 2 per element

Input.name: thermCondPar3
Input.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 3 per element

Input.name: thermCondPar4
Input.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 4 per element

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat profile at nodes

Input.name: soilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature at nodes including air and surface nodes

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Snapshot of soil temperature profile around 5 AM for diagnostics

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Node heat storage term (volumetric heat capacity times volume per time step)

Input.name: thermalConductance
Input.description: Node conductance (conductivity divided by element length)

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Thermal conductivity profile mapped to nodes including surface/air node

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Daily-averaged atmospheric boundary layer conductance at surface node

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Working array for new temperature solution at nodes

Input.name: airTemperature
Input.description: Current air node temperature used as boundary condition

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature for diurnal interpolation

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature for diurnal interpolation

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Node or layer soil water content used in heat capacity/conductivity

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node (accumulator)

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node (accumulator)

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily average soil temperature per node (accumulator)

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division with fallback value when divisor is zero.

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if an array contains any valid (non-sentinel) values.

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sums values in a list between start and end indices ignoring sentinel.

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Sets all elements of an array to zero.

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Computes cumulative thickness from layer thickness array.

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns constituent volumetric specific heat constant by name.

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of rocks by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of organic matter by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of sand by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of silt by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of clay by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of water by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Returns volumetric fraction of ice (here 0).

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Computes volumetric fraction of air by layer as residue.

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns thermal conductance parameter per constituent (preserving original behavior).

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Returns shape factor per constituent (preserving original behavior).

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Maps layer-based arrays to node-based arrays via depth-weighted interpolation.

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Computes empirical thermal conductivity coefficients per element.

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Computes initial seasonal soil temperature profile by depth.

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Interpolates hourly air temperature over the diurnal cycle.

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes longwave radiation from emissivity and temperature.

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Partitions daily radiation into sub-daily solar radiation and cloud factor.

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes net radiation at soil surface for an internal time step.

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Estimates soil surface temperature from albedo, mean and max air temperature, and radiation.

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes node volumetric specific heat using constituent list and soil water.

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes node thermal conductivity using mixture rules and maps to nodes.

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Thomas algorithm solver for 1D heat diffusion tridiagonal system with surface flux boundary.

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Computes atmospheric boundary layer conductance with stability corrections.

Function.name: math_sin
Function.description: Wrapper for math.sin.

Function.description: Wrapper for math.cos.

Function.description: Wrapper for math.exp.
